title: Pre-Socialization Training Design to Enhance Online Project-Based Science Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in science conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, where learner interaction and task complexity management are core challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can perform science projects with over 80% completeness using online collaboration tools within six months.
Learners can improve social connectedness indicators in online learning environments by over 30% through pre-socialization training.
Learners can decompose complex scientific tasks into steps and establish actionable PBL (Project-Based Learning) plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
